extendedInfo.description: Now download previous versions of Androrec from http://yorkerapps.com/#tab-2â¢ Please do not keep other call recorders active when Androrec is enabled. Otherwise Androrec will fail to record your calls.â¢ For Galaxy S2 users - It has been reported that once upgraded to android 4.0.3, Androrec no more works in mode 3, it will record in mode 1 from Mic only. Please don't rate badly. It is not the fault of Androrec.â¢ Please test the different recording modes to see which mode works best for you. Mode 3 is recommended for Samsung Galaxy S2 users having android version less than 4.0.â¢ For Motorola users -  I request you kindly don't give bad ratings as the problem is with Motorola hardware not with AndroRec call Recorder.------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------AndroRec is a very light weight yet powerful call recorder for android phones that records all your incoming and out going calls automatically to your SD card (External Storage).Features :â¢ Absolutely free and ad freeâ¢ Records all incoming and outgoing callsâ¢ Option to enable/disable call recordingâ¢ No time limit for recordingâ¢ Log of all the recorded calls can be viewed from the application. You can play or delete or archive recordings from the application itselfâ¢ Log shows the contact number/name, exact date time as well as duration of your call making it easy to track all your calls from the applicationLimitations :â¢ Can't record calls from Bluetoothâ¢ May not record the opposite side voice in some phones due to hardware limitationsNote : In Some phones the tone from the other side of the call might be a little low. If so, please enable speaker phone to get a clearer recording. This is a limitation from Android OS and the device manufacturers and has nothing to do with AndroRec call recorder. The recorded audio files can be found in your SD card in androrec folder.Please leave a comment or drop a mail to support@yorkerapps.com if you find any problem with the application. Remember to include your device model, android version and the problem you are facing.

reviews.title: Go ahead...awesome.....excellent
reviews.comment: Very nice application....v can hear both side sound very clearly....so......it\'s far far better applications than any other free version
reviews.author: arjun raghavan

reviews.title: Samsung Note  \"FINNALLY ONE THAT WORKS !!!\"
reviews.comment: I couldn\'t find a recording phone call app which recorded the other person when the phone was to my ear, I could only here my side of the conversation or the other was too low. Only when I was on the speaker.  This one works great on both speakers, nice and clear on Mode 2. THANK YOU !!!!
reviews.author: Susan Hare

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on a Galaxy Note.
reviews.comment: All it does is record my voice but not the person\'s voice at the other end. Sometimes I would click on already saved recordings and i get a crash report.
reviews.author: Mark Hunter

reviews.title: Galaxy S3 User
reviews.comment: Hardly works for the S3.  I went through all the modes and it only works on \"Mode 1 (MIC)\" and the recording formats I\'ve used so far were AMR and MPEG4. Still with that being set up it WILL NOT work UNLESS you put it on speakerphone.  YES you have to put your phone on speaker for it to work!   Being that you have to tweak it a certain way for the app to work I\'ve given it a 4STAR rating because this is MAYBE the 1 out of too many phonecall recording apps that ACTUALLY WORK!
reviews.author: Frank Utu

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy s2. Jelly bean 4.1.2. Mode 2.
reviews.comment: Hi all This app will allow you to record opponent voice and own voice (both) during the call. Settings mode 2 and format mpg4. Mode 3 & 4 both will not work and shows error 1003 1004 (really don\'t know what they are).  So great app wich can be record in call recordings.
reviews.author: Vijay Sheshu

reviews.title: does not work on Sprint Samsung Nexus S 4G
reviews.comment: Recording mode 1 only records silence and all other modes cause an error.
reviews.author: Matthew Conover

reviews.title: Unhappy
reviews.comment: I don\'t know why it does not work efficiently on duos mobiles.... It records the calls on cdma no, &. Unable to record the calls on gsm no. After 2sec....
reviews.author: ANUPRIYA AGRAWAL

reviews.title: Not working
reviews.comment: Its not working in my galaxy S duos. Such a waste of time. May be it works in some other phones.
reviews.author: anju rajput

reviews.title: Out dated ... sucks ..!!!!
reviews.comment: Within 2 days of installation ... call recording stops and starts showing unknown errors . Waste of time.
reviews.author: Nirav Shah

reviews.title: Didn\'t work
reviews.comment: On my galaxy S3 the recordings only came through as static. Tell me what I\'m doing wrong or how to fix it? No clue.
reviews.author: Geordin Craun

reviews.title: one star less because......
reviews.comment: mode 3 and mode4 not working. showing an error code 1003. but in mode2 fantastic app..... thank you soo much.
reviews.author: Shubham Bhagat

reviews.title: Won\'t play back files
reviews.comment: Great idea... and I need this.. but says my phone doesn\'t support the files on playback.. bummer!
reviews.author: Lori Holdredge

reviews.title: One of the best
reviews.comment: Finally, something free and working. Works with dual sim, which most other apps don\'t. Recommend.
reviews.author: Shri Ram

reviews.title: Works beautifully
reviews.comment: I know some people have trouble with call recorders on their phones, so did i. I deleted any files linked with the other ones, and even erased the stock sound recorder. Reported the phone, and now just recorded a crisp 7 minute telephone call. :)
reviews.author: EMILIO pacheco

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Great app as long as u can get it set right on ur phone. Thats the hard part. But worth it.
reviews.author: Randy White

reviews.title: Bug in call notifications
reviews.comment: in my LG l9 phone, if this \"Androrec\" app is enabled, I am not getting call notification for call waiting.  and I am missing all important calls.  they should provide option for enable/disable call notification sounds.  other than this its good, but call waiting tones are very important , so iam not going use this SW any more.
reviews.author: Ramanand Reddy

reviews.title: Was nice but not now
reviews.comment: Was gr8 at one time but it not recording a single calls now in my phone crashing
reviews.author: ghulam ghaus shaikh

reviews.title: Works fine with Galaxy S3 Running 4.1.2
reviews.comment: This app. has four recording modes so and it\'s worth trying them all.  On my S3 running 4.1.2, Mode 2 works very well indeed and records both the caller and callee.
reviews.author: James Butler

reviews.title: Galaxy s2
reviews.comment: Really a great app.. It works so well that no other recorder is required.. Love it..
reviews.author: Yasir Rasul

reviews.title: Not for galaxy s3
reviews.comment: Tried all modes and options, does not work, comes up with an error message.
reviews.author: Harrison Otalor
